full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 REMITTER: BRAVO-REYES, M. U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE FILING DATE: 05/04/88 FOR: M. BRAVO-REYES IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE A NUMBER: A91807746 QDE: 0305300 1671 WILSHIRE BLVD. BANK NO: 90-2800 INTERVIEW DATE: 11/03/88 LOS ANGELES, CA 90017 RECEIPT NUMBER: XX0885295058 INTERVIEW TIME: 15:50 PM FEE TYPE: CMO AMOUNT: 185.00 FORM NO.: I687L THIS LETTER IS TO ACKNOWLEDGE RECEIPT OF YOUR APPLICATION FOR LEGALIZATION. YOU ARE SCHEDULED TO APPEAR FOR AN INTERVIEW WITH A LEGALIZATION OFFICER ON 11/03/88. PLEASE BRING ANY ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS WHICH SUPPORT YOUR APPLICATION. IF YOU FAIL TO APPEAR AT THE DESIGNATED TIME AND PLACE, YOUR APPLICATION FOR LEGALIZATION MAY BE DENIED. THIS IS NOT AN AUTHORIZATION TO TRAVEL OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES. THIS DOCUMENT BECOMES INVALID FOR ANY PURPOSE IF IT IS ALTERED. THIS DOCUMENT MAY ONLY BE DUPLICATED BY AN EMPLOYER FOR VERIFICATION PURPOSES. IT IS RECOMMENDED THAT YOU CARRY THIS DOCUMENT WITH YOU AT ALL TIMES. YOU ARK GRANTED EMPLOYMENT AUTHORIZATION WHICH EXPIRES ON 11/03/88. YOU ARE NOT AUTHORIZED EMPLOYMENT BEYOND THAT DATE. MARIA BRAVO-REYES INTERVIEW DATE: 11/03/88 225 N. 2ND ST. INTERVIEW TIME: 15:50 MONTEBELLO,, CA 90640 REPORT TO THE ADDRESS AT THE TOP CENTER OF THIS LETTER, U.S. DEPARTMENT JUSTICE ON THE DATE AND TIME STATED ABOVE. INS COPY FORM NO. I689 5/87
